name: cherry
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 a small, round, soft red or black fruit with a single hard seed in the middle, or the tree on which the fruit grows
Isabelle Rozenbaum/ PhotoAlto Agency RF Collections/GettyImages
Examples
The cherry tree is beginning to blossom.Could you stone the cherries for me?I had a cherry flavoured drink.She placed a bowl of cherries on the table.
